channel.title: Welcome to Quadrate Tech Guru | Free Tech School
channel.description: Recent content on Welcome to Quadrate Tech Guru | Free Tech School

item.title: Single Page Application With .Net Core and Blazor
item.description: Introduction In this article, we will create a Single Page Application (SPA) using server-side Blazor. We will use an Entity Framework Core database. Single-Page Applications are web applications that load a single HTML page.

item.title: Single Page Application With .Net Core and Blazor
item.description: Introduction In this article, we will create a Single Page Application (SPA) using server-side Blazor. We will use an Entity Framework Core database. Single-Page Applications are web applications that load a single HTML page.

item.title: Microsoft Blazor Web API with JWT Authentication
item.description: I would like to share a guide on how to implement a JWT Authentication system into a Dotnet Core 2 Web API project that uses Microsofts new Blazor, but this same guide can be used for regular Asp.

item.title: Design Patterns in Java
item.description: Design patterns in java are best practices which are used to resolve some known issues. Design patterns can be divided into 3 different types. Here we have listed down some of the widely used design patterns in Java.

item.title: Java Interview FAQ's
item.description: If you are preparing for a Java-based interview, it’s a good idea to go through Java Interview Questions. I have written a lot of interview questions articles in Core Java, Java EE to popular frameworks.

item.title: Trending Programming Languages in 2020
item.description: 2020 is almost here, as crazy as that sounds The year 2020 sounds like it’s derived from science fiction, yet here we are — about to knock on its front door.

item.title: Building an Angular Project With Bootstrap 4 and Firebase
item.description: Part 1: Setting Up The Project In this tutorial I’ll show you how to start your Angular 5 Project from scratch and add Bootstrap 4 and the Firebase library to your application.

item.title: Spring Interview Questions and Answers
item.description: What is Spring Framework? What are some of the important features and advantages of Spring Framework? What do you understand by Dependency Injection? How do we implement DI in Spring Framework?

item.title: Core Java Interview Questions and Answers
item.description: Name some important features of Java 12 release? What are the important features of Java 11 release? What are the important features of Java 10 release?

item.title: Angular Interview Questions and Answers Part 1
item.description: Q1. What is Angular 4 and how it differs from Angular 1.x? Angular 4 is a Javascript framework built around the concept of components, and more precisely, with the Web Components standard in mind.

item.title: How to perform calendar calculations in your head
item.description: so-called calendrical savant (or calendar savant) is someone who despite their intellectual disability (typically autism) can name the day of the week of a given date, or visa versa in a few seconds or even a tenth of a second (Kennedy & Squire, 2007).

item.title: How Not to Get 30k Bill From Firebase
item.description: July last year, a crowd funding campaign went viral in Colombia. It was all good and dandy in the first 48 hours. They managed to reach over 2 million sessions and over 20 million page views — with a website that stayed fully functional without a hitch.

item.title: Calculations in Your Head
item.description: so-called calendrical savant (or calendar savant) is someone who despite their intellectual disability (typically autism) can name the day of the week of a given date, or visa versa in a few seconds or even a tenth of a second (Kennedy & Squire, 2007).
